当付がましい: (あてつけがましい) - insinuating; snide
当付けがましい: (あてつけがましい) - insinuating; snide
当代: (とうだい) - the present age; these days; (present) head of the family
当代無双: (とうだいむそう) - (yoji) being unsurpassed (unparalleled) at present
当代無比: (どうだいむひ) - (yoji) being unsurpassed (unparalleled) at present
当代第一: (とうだいだいいち) - (yoji) the greatest of the day
当代随一: (とうだいずいいち) - (yoji) the greatest of the day
当会: (とうかい) - present society; this company; the organization; the organisation
当分: (とうぶん) - for the present; currently; presently; at this time; for the next while
当分の間: (とうぶんのかん) - for the present; for the time being
当初予算: (とうしょよさん) - initial budget; original budget
当否: (とうひ) - propriety; right or wrong; justice
当営業所: (とうえいぎょうしょ) - our (the present) business office
当字: (あてじ) - kanji used as a phonetic symbol, instead of for the meaning/phonetic-equivalent character/substitute character; kanji used for their meaning, irrespective of reading
当局: (toukyoku) - autoridades, autoridades competentes, autoridades responsáveis; este escritório
当山: (とうざん) - this mountain; this temple
当帰: (トウキ) - dong dang gui (aromatic herb similar to dong quai, Angelica acutiloba); dong quai (aromatic herb used to treat various gynecological symptoms, Angelica sinensis)
当年: (とうねん) - the present year; at that time
当座: (とうざ) - for the time being/for the present/temporarily/for a time; immediate/present/current; for some time (after); current account
当座凌ぎ: (とうざしのぎ) - makeshift; for the time being
当座比率: (とうざひりつ) - acid-test ratio; quick ratio; cash-to-current-liabilities ratio
当座預金: (とうざよきん) - current account/transactional account; checking account/cheque account/demand account
当座預金口座: (とうざよきんこうざ) - checking account; cheque account
当惑: (とうわく) - bewilderment; perplexity; embarrassment; confusion
当惑気味: (とうわくぎみ) - (yoji) being somewhat puzzled; looking somewhat baffled
当意即妙: (とういそくみょう) - (yoji) ready wit
当所: (とうしょ) - this place; this office
当接: (とうせつ) - coming into contact; abutting
当方: (とうほう) - us; me; my (our) part
当方負担: (とうほうふたん) - (yoji) (at) our expense; (on) our risk
当日: (とうじつ) - appointed day; very day
当期純利益: (とうきじゅんりえき) - current net income; net income for the year; current net earnings; current net profit; current term net income; current term net profit; net profit for the year
当校: (とうこう) - this school; the school in question
当業者: (とうぎょうしゃ) - person skilled (in the art of doing something)
当歳: (とうさい) - year of birth; this year
当歳駒: (とうさいごま) - yearling; one-year-old colt
当為: (とうい) - needing to be done; requiring a response
当然: (touzen) - natural, como uma questão de costume, justificado, merecido, razoável
当然ながら: (とうぜんながら) - naturally; of course; understandably
当然のこと: (とうぜんのこと) - a matter of course; what is to be expected; par for the course
当然のことながら: (とうぜんのことながら) - naturally; not surprisingly; it should be appreciated that; understandably; as a matter of course; as is obvious; as will be understood
当然の事: (とうぜんのこと) - a matter of course; what is to be expected; par for the course
当然の報い: (とうぜんのむくい) - one's just deserts; one's just reward; what one deserves; come uppance
当然視する: (とうぜんしする) - to consider to be inevitable; to consider to be reasonable
当用漢字: (とうようかんじ) - daily-use kanji (superseded in 1981)
当番兵: (とうばんへい) - batman; officer's orderly
当直: (とうちょく) - on duty; on a shift; keeping watch
当直勤務: (とうちょくきんむ) - shift duty; point duty
当直員: (とうちょくいん) - person on duty
当確: (とうかく) - projected to win; sure to be elected; home free
当社比: (とうしゃひ) - compared to our company's products (a phrase often used in advertising when comparing old and new products)/in this company's comparison; as I see it/by my estimate
当籤: (とうせん) - winning (in a lottery, raffle, etc.)
当籤券: (とうせんけん) - winning ticket (in a lottery, etc.)
当職: (とうしょく) - this duty or job
当腹: (とうぶく) - child born to one's current wife
当薬: (とうやく) - dried Swertia japonica (used as a traditional medicine)
当該: (tougai) - appropriate (por exemplo, autoridades), concerned, relevant, said, aforementioned, competent, applicable, respective
当該人物: (とうがいじんぶつ) - (yoji) the appropriate person; competent person
当該官庁: (とうがいかんちょう) - proper authorities; authorities concerned
当選: (とうせん) - being elected; being selected (to win a prize, etc.); winning (in a lottery, raffle, etc.)
当選券: (とうせんけん) - winning ticket (in a lottery, etc.)
当選圏内: (とうせんけんない) - (yoji) (having a) good chance of being elected (winning) (in an election)
当選基数: (とうせんきすう) - electoral quota (e.g. in a proportional representation system)
当選当確: (とうせんとうかく) - (from 当選及び当選確実) candidates (in an election) who have won or are projected to be elected
当選確実: (とうせんかくじつ) - projected to win; sure to be elected; home free
当金: (とうきん) - cash; cash payment; payment on the spot
当銀: (とうぎん) - cash; cash payment; payment on the spot
当院: (とういん) - this institution; this parliament; this hospital; this clinic
